allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor: Move skills and agents to canonical .claude/ structure

- Move all skills from sidekick/skills/ to .claude/skills/
- Move all agents from sidekick/agents/ to .claude/agents/
- Update documentation references in README.md and CLAUDE.md
- Update error message path in sidekick/config.py
- Remove old sidekick/skills/ and sidekick/agents/ directories

This aligns with Claude Code''s canonical directory structure where
skills and agents are documentation in .claude/ rather than Python
modules in the package directory.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
